price: (154) You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mith'lunā fati biāyatin in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
